_xResult.title: State of Affairs Linen Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made blue linen blazer with tie closure
_xResult.longdesc:
An elegant enterance into any affair is guarenteed when you sport this hand-crafted blouse from Aiste. The details are as endless as the sea when it comes to this piece—her one-of-a-kind textured fabric, structured collar in the back and the wrapped sillhoutte enhancing a v-neck shape are a few of the things we can't get enough of.

 

Aiste says "I begin with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique textured cloth.  Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly; wherever you may go, simply pack them to your travel bag.  No additional ironing."

 

If you've never experienced having a blouse made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
